body: These comics are good but the doo doo is too much.
... Tbh who the fuck get sexually attracted to shits? I mean sure we have this very weird fetishes. But bro, thats just a whole new level...

@SovereignKillz sorry, I mean this.
A form of sexual desire in which gratification is linked to an abnormal degree to a particular object, item of clothing, part of the body, etc. It's actually mean anything and everything can become a fetish as long as you feel sexually attached to this sort of thing.
@Animaelover I mean you just said it, a fetish is an attraction to any form of sex. So with that said idk how liking scat is a fetish, makes no sense. It's literally body waste.
I love this doujin, I really do except for the shit part. Damn.. this author must really like shit huh..
que asco!!!!, igual me la jalé (y) +10
I, too, only tolerate scat when it's by this artist. But I'm really gay for their work so I'd tolerate a whole lot before I stopped reading.

@killa fetish implies to anybody who sexually attracts to any form of sex. Unfortunately for you you seem to lack smarts for what a fetish really is. In scat, people love scat. But there are other worse fetishes than scat. Torture fetish, beating up fetish, weapon fetish, whatsoever. Could this be even worse than scat fetish I ask??

Scat is by far the most disgusting "fetish" in existence. I will never understand why you would ruin an out doujin with it, and make it a LITERAL pile of shit. Its quite literally the fetish of worshiping something your own body doesn't want.
Chinzurena is the only mangaka that makes me tolerate scat. Cuz its too friggin cute. great doujin btw
I don't care about scat, but this kind of simplistic art disgusts me
@Shinobinomono You are EXACTLY right. Tell it to him guys, he's your new friend :+)

this is for scat and trap lovers, if you dont like it then dont read it because it wasnt made for you. alot of people on here like scat and scat yaoi hentai is very hard to find, just because some of you dont like it that doesnt mean it shouldnt be uploaded because guess what the world doesnt revolve around you and what you like, this page panders to everyone not just you uptight punks. saying it should be taken down just because some of you dont like it is like saying they should stop uploading yaoi because not everyone likes it.
To be honest, the poop they made in this manga is so inspiring and well designed! I should tell people who shame on us scat fetish are a bunch of dumbwitted onaholes.
Could’ve gone without the scat but like @NocturneSky said, at least i came before i found out it had scat in it (my dumbass looked over that tag of course smh)
Chinzurena is to only artist that make me tolerate scat. Good doujin nonetheless.
The ones that chinzu made don't have scat are good but why ruin others with scat?
Chinzurena, the only one who KINDA makes me tolerate scat
Shit, literally...

Admiting they like gay doujin pretty gay huh. Eitherway i dont mind the lack of story, because most if not all have bad story to begin with, only the true top tier doujins plot outweigh the plot. Usually having alot of people commenting wholesome or come to fap not to cry. People bitch bout everything cuz Hurrr durrr my taste is so good all these millenials would bow before me.
Accurate depictions of the gays loving the poopoo
it aint gon work if you add a mountain of excrements. it really do be like dat sometimes Chief

I honestly do not completely hate chinzurena's doujins and there are a few that I liked.
The real problem with it is how repetitive and boring it sometimes gets.
This is the perfect example of why sometimes i just get bored of trap doujins, they almost always follow the same storylines:The crazy horny trap, The shy one and so on so forth.
P.S:I just hate scat in general(If you like it I have nothing against you-De gustibus i guess)but chinzurena's way of drawing it is just disgusting.
At least I came before I knew there was fucking scat in this.

Chinzurena I love you, I love yours shotas, and I love yours poops. This is the BEST. Please do more!!! x3 ❤

This looks fucking disgustng, fuck off Chinzurena your stuff is mad overrated, Inb4 someone tries to @ me, keep in mind I will not stop writing negative reasons of why I find Chinzurena to be such an overpraised artist until someone gives up, I literally like 2 works of Chinzu out of the 100+ shit they have done.
